arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the stream consumer.

creationTimestamp.description: Approximate timestamp in [RFC3339 format](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.8) of when the stream consumer was created.

streamArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data stream the consumer is registered with.
